#include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <stdbool.h>

#define EPS 1e-8
#define clr(ar) memset(ar, 0, sizeof(ar))
#define read() freopen("lol.txt", "r", stdin)

double dp[2515][2515];
bool visited[2515][2515] = {false};

double F(int f, int s){
    if (!f && !s) return 0.0;
    if (visited[f][s]) return dp[f][s];

    double x, p, res = 0.0, lol = 0.0;
    double n = f, m = s, d = 1.0 / (s * (s - 1));

    p = n / m;
    if (fabs(p) > EPS) res += (p * (F(n - 1, m - 1) + 1.0) );

    p = (m - n) * (m - n - 2) * d;
    if (fabs(p) > EPS) res += (p * (F(n + 2, m - 2) + 1.0) );

    p = (m - n) * n * d;
    if (fabs(p) > EPS) res += (p * (F(n, m - 2) + 2.0) );

    p = (m - n) * d;
    if (fabs(p) > EPS) res += (p * (F(n, m - 2) + 1.0) );


    p = (n / m);
    if (fabs(p) > EPS) lol += (p * (F(n - 1, m - 1) + 1.0) );
    p = ((m - n) / m);
    if (fabs(p) > EPS) lol += (p * (F(n + 1, m - 1) + 1.0) );
    if (lol < res) res = lol;

    visited[f][s] = true;
    return (dp[f][s] = res);
}

int main(){
    int i, j, k, n, m;

    while (scanf("%d %d", &n, &m) != EOF){
        k = n * m;
        double res = F(0, k) + 1e-9;
        printf("%0.4f\n", res);
    }
    return 0;
}
